title: Ticketmaster is now hiding upcoming concert and sporting events in Snapchat’s Map Layer
content:
Starting today, Snapchat users can now discover current and upcoming events nearby. Through the new Snapchat Map Layer, anyone can browse Ticketmaster’s catalog of comedy shows, sporting events, and a multitude of concerts.

more…

The post Ticketmaster is now hiding upcoming concert and sporting events in Snapchat’s Map Layer appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Snapchat's Map Layer lets users browse Ticketmaster's catalogue to discover current and upcoming events near them.
